articles.description: Whoopi Goldberg is reflecting on her historic Oscar win for playing Oda Mae Brown in Ghost, which earned her the Best Supporting Actress trophy at the 1991 Academy Awards.
articles.content:
Whoopi Goldberg is reflecting on her historic Oscar win for playing the iconic Oda Mae Brown in Ghost, which earned her the Best Supporting Actress trophy at the 1991 Academy Awards.

articles.author: Emily VanDerWerff
articles.title: Fearless (Taylor’s Version): Her songs haven’t changed. But she has. - Vox.com
articles.description: On the re-recorded version of her 2008 album Fearless, the artist’s new perspective on her work shines through.
articles.content: On the re-recorded version of her 2008 album Fearless, the artists new perspective on her work shines through.
